Text:
can not burn this
just for vlc

shame
min søndag ble ødelagt , sto opp og så 
den oransje vlc trekanten

@markien .... This is a so called .img file .... 

Try to change the filename ( The filename extension )
==================
from :

inc-playkeeps.img

To :

inc-playkeeps.iso
==================

Then .... probably .... your burning program will handle 
this file as an ISO DVD ("One click file" so to speak ).
